Html:
Hi,

 

I am using Excel Data Reader.dll to read excel files. Now I want to read comments in a cell.

Please help me how to read the comments in a cell.

 

Regards,

Shankar L

Hello,

First of all, I would say thanks for this tool. It works in my project properly.

Shankar: If you need more than the value of the cells, add a new column to the excel sheet that contains the comments then export the file (write a macro to insert comments to this column). If you need help to make this macro, let me know.

regards,

Csaba J.
